content: bad hair day got ya down throw on this cute bucket hat and gain some extra style points this warm weather hat will shade your face while allowing a breeze to pass though it s paper-y fabric a variation on the half-double_crochet stitch creates a brim with enough substance to keep its shape **this pattern is part of a live event hosted by the creative crochet corner the pattern is free when signing up for the creative crochet corner newsletter 1 you can watch the free live tutorial over at the creative crochet corner website 2 or over here on youtube 3 ** **yarn used for hat shown** raffia cotton yarn purchased here 4 on amazon it is sold by the cone from the rayon crochet raffia yarn brand on amazon each cone measures 306-328 yds 280-300m it is made of 100% cotton and wood fiber this raffia is not a flat ribbon shape instead it is a mostly-round twine-shaped yarn gauge work through round 9 of hat directions piece measures 4 in diameter 17 sts and 19 rnds = 4 1 https //go creativecrochetcorner com/a41144/ 2 https //www creativecrochetcorner com/video/sunray-bucket-hat-live-tutorial-with-brenda-k-b-anderson/ 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=vyrvyr0mqm8 4 https //www amazon com/dp/b07sv1f21s/ref=redir_mobile_desktop _encoding=utf8&ref=ppx_pop_mob_b_asin_image&th=1
